span.breadcrumb_last,.tourbrd span,.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p,ul.highlight-this-tour li,.TourDates p,.pkg-inc ul li, .pkg-exc ul li,.tour-overview p b,h2.tourDBox,.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    margin-top: 20px;
}
.sidebar_section_col h3, .sidebar_section_col2 h3, .sidebar_section_col div {
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #fff;
    background: #061b30;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Roboto';
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    color: #000;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li i {
    padding-right: 5px;
    color: #c00100;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg {
    background: #f1f3f2;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg a {
    color: #c00100;
    text-align: right;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0px;
    list-style: none;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

.TourDates p {
    font-weight: bold;
}

.tourbrd a {
    color: #bf000c;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.tour-collection .table-responsive {
    min-height: .01%;
    overflow-x: auto;
}
.tour-collection table {
    width: 100%;
    background: #9e9e9e54;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table tr {
    background-color: #fef2b8;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table th {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    padding-top: 6px !important;
    padding-bottom: 6px !important;
    background-color: #061b30;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table td {
    padding-top: 5px !important;
    padding-bottom: 5px !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    font-size: 14px;
    border: none !important;
	font-family: 'Roboto';
	font-weight: bold;
}

.pkg-inc ul li,.pkg-exc ul li {
    padding: 7px 0px 7px 22px !important;
    list-style: none;
    background: url(/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/inc.jpg) no-repeat left;
}

.pkg-inc ul li:before,.pkg-exc ul li:before {

}
.pkg-exc ul li {

<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Manali Honeymoon Packages</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/india-tour-packages" title="India Tour Packages">India</a> » <a href="/himachal-tour-packages" title="Himachal Tour Packages">Himachal Pradesh</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Manali Honeymoon Packages</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c367b7aa2b1_51846765" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/manali-honeymoon.jpg" alt="Manali Honeymoon Package" title="Manali Honeymoon Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Manali is a favourite among travellers and honeymoon-goers. Mystic Mountain, sound of the flowing river and magical greenery play a part in turning an ordinary honeymoon into an unforgettable one. The Manali honeymoon package brings to you the best of both worlds. From visiting important temples in Manali to indulging in adventure experiences. A honeymoon in Manali will be hard to forget.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Manali Honeymoon Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Delhi - Manali</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>The first day of your trip will commence from Delhi. Manali is a 13 hours bus journey away from Delhi. The Volvo ride will take place at night and by day break you will be arriving in Manali. Arrival in Manali will be followed by checking in to your resort here. The rest of the day will be spent in leisure and recovery. Dinner and night stay will be done here.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Manali Full Day Sightseeing</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After breakfast in the morning, your full day of sightseeing in Manali will begin. Our tour representative will guide you to famous places in Manali. Start off by getting blessings from Hidimba Devi Mata. Surrounded by dense cedar and pine forests this temple is very powerful. Everyone visiting Manali should visit this temple at least once. Later on you will be headed for the club house that also contains a roller skating rink. By lunch time you can head over to the restaurant. Post lunch you will be covering Van Vihar and a Tibetan monastery. Finally, after a day of sightseeing, you will be taken for a holy dip at the hot water spring in Vashisht.</p>
<p>After ending the day on a relaxing note, you will be taken back to your hotel in Manali for dinner and an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Manali - Solang Excursion</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After breakfast you will be made to head for your next destination in Solang valley for an adventure packed day. The route to Solang from Manali is extremely mesmerising. You will be indulging in fun activities like skiing, yak rides, snow scooter ride, horse riding, paragliding etc. finally after a full day of adventure and fun you will be headed back to your hotel in Manali for dinner and an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Manali - Kullu / Manikaran - Manali</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After having breakfast, your day out of excursion to Kullu and Manikaran will begin. Here you will be first of all headed for the Vaishno Mata Temple in Kullu. This will be followed by a souvenir shopping expedition in Kullu shawl factory. Manikaran Gurudwara visit will be next on your list. One can take a holy dip here as well since there are hot water springs available. If there is time remaining, then you can check out the scenic place of Kasol. Its cafes and vibe is well known all over India. Finally, after a day out of excursion you will be headed back to your hotel in Manali for dinner and an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Manali Departure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After having breakfast, you will be checked out of your hotel in Manali. You will be taken to the old Manali bus stand. You will be headed back to your departure location in Delhi. The drop-off in Delhi will mark the end of your romantic Manali Honeymoon Tour Package with us.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Manali Honeymoon Tour Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> When Can I See Snow In Manali?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The winter months from December to early February is the best time for you to experience snowfall in Manali.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Is Manali An Expensive Travel Destination?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> No. Manali is one of the most pocket-friendly tourist destinations in India.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which Is The Peak Tourist Season In Manali?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The summer/spring months in Manali from April to June are the peak tourist months in Manali.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Is Manali Safe To Travel For Tourists?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Yes. Manali is one of the safest tourist destinations in India where people can travel without worrying with their family, friends or even solo.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which River Goes Through Manali?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The Beas River goes through Manali.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

excerpt.rendered: Manali Honeymoon Packages Home » India » Himachal Pradesh » Manali Honeymoon Packages Tour Overview Manali is a favourite among travellers and honeymoon-goers. Mystic Mountain, sound of the flowing river and magical greenery play a part in turning an ordinary honeymoon into an unforgettable one. The Manali honeymoon package brings to you the best of...
